meanings.definition: A linear representation of important events in chronological order.
meanings.sent1: I drew a timeline of my life from birth to now.
meanings.sent2: The history textbook had a detailed timeline of World War II.
meanings.sent3: My cat created a timeline of her daily routine, complete with nap times.
meanings.sent4: The timeline of technological advancements shows how far we've come.
meanings.sent5: The timeline of the universe is mind-bogglingly vast.

meanings.definition: A schedule or plan of events.
meanings.sent1: The project manager created a timeline for the construction work.
meanings.sent2: I need to check the timeline to see when the meeting starts.
meanings.sent3: The timeline for the party had everyone arriving at the same time.
meanings.sent4: Following the timeline ensures we finish the project on time.
meanings.sent5: The timeline for the road trip was carefully planned out.

meanings.definition: A graphical representation of a sequence of events.
meanings.sent1: The timeline on the poster displayed the history of music.
meanings.sent2: The timeline graph showed the rise and fall of the stock market.
meanings.sent3: The timeline illustration made the story easy to follow.
meanings.sent4: The timeline chart helped visualize the progression of the disease.
meanings.sent5: The timeline diagram clarified the historical events for the students.
